name: test_e2e_with_logs[532_SSRF_DNS_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SSRF_DNS_001` |
| **Name** | Hex IP Bypass for Localhost |
| **Category** | SSRF |
| **Subcategory** | dns_rebinding |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `http://0x7f000001/`
